key.name: default-mode
key.description: Mode to use on startup: Performance, Balanced, Efficiency, Quiet, Auto, UltraEfficiency

key.name: remember-last-mode
key.description: If enabled, the proxy will remember and restore the last used efficiency mode on startup

key.name: last-mode
key.description: The last efficiency mode that was active before shutdown

key.name: auto-quiet-hours-enabled
key.summary: Enable quiet hours for Auto mode
key.description: When enabled, Auto mode will switch to Quiet mode during configured quiet hours

key.name: auto-quiet-hours-start
key.description: Hour when quiet hours begin (0-23, 24-hour format)

key.name: auto-quiet-hours-end
key.description: Hour when quiet hours end (0-23, 24-hour format)

key.name: autostart-enabled
key.description: Automatically start the Ollama Proxy when logging in to GNOME

key.name: dbus-enabled
key.description: Enable D-Bus API for desktop integration and external control

key.name: notify-on-mode-change
key.description: Display a desktop notification when efficiency mode changes

key.name: notify-on-backend-failure
key.description: Display a desktop notification when a backend becomes unhealthy

key.name: notify-on-thermal-throttle
key.description: Display a desktop notification when thermal throttling is activated

key.name: show-indicator
key.description: Display the Ollama Proxy indicator in the GNOME Shell top bar

key.name: indicator-show-mode
key.description: Display the current efficiency mode name in the top bar indicator

key.name: indicator-show-backend-count
key.description: Display the number of healthy backends in the top bar indicator
